label: Troparia for Saint Macrina the Younger

work_wit.alt_title: Troparia for Saint Macrina the Younger

note.value: The folios contain troparia (one kathisma and four stichera) to be performed on the feast of Saint Macrina the Younger, sister of Saint Basil the Great and Gregory of Nyssa, on 19th July (see MR VI 159–168) (Rossetto)
Description by Nigel Wilson, Giulia Rossetto

Bibliography: Abbreviation for the edition, MR VI = Μηναῖα τοῦ ὅλου ἐνιαουτοῦ, VI, Ἐν Ῥώμῃ 1901 ; G. Rossetto, Greek Palimpsests at Saint Catherine's Monastery (Sinai): Three Euchologia as Case Studies, Vienna 2022
